thread.section_title: Westminster Teak Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Westminster Teak | www.westminsterteak.com
thread.title: Olivia C
thread.title_full: Westminster Teak reviewed by Olivia C

author: Olivia C
title: Olivia C
text:
Orderning anything unseen online can be challenging. Delivering orders to HI can be expensive and complicated.
I had the best of luck with Westminster Teak. Sales people were very easy to communicate with and really knowledgeable. I got clear information about which stain - protectant to use for best results in our climate.
Orderning was easy - you can order directly from website or work with a person. Now that the furniture arrived in Kauai everything looks stunning. Beautiful design, great workmanship, great cushions. I could not ask for anything more. Thank you
